title: Premiere: Hibou – Sunder
content: Having well and truly made his mark with double A single Glow / Hollow, Hibou, the project of nineteen year old Peter Michel from Seattle returns with his hotly anticipated self-released new EP, Dunes. The opening track to be taken from it, Sunder, is a lush, sprawling surf pop jam, channeling Wild Nothing and The Drums, alongside touches of The Cure. With songwriting this good and a cunning ear for a swelteringly addictive hook, Hibou is sure to have labels falling over themselves. Sunder is available as a free download from Hibou’s Bandcamp page, with the rest of EP released on 13 June.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
